page.title: 20WALKING IN HELMSHORE.
page.content:
Many of the most attractive country walks are to be found in the Helmshore area. The{Tor}is one of the most outstanding walks, if you are feeling energetic! If you like unspoiled moorland with few buildings in sight, {Burnt Hill}provides an interesting ramble.
{Reservoirs}to the North of the region provide opportunities for scenic routes.
Recently a long distance footpath has been established. The{"Rossendale Way" will hopefully become a popular attraction to residents and tourists alike.
{CLASS THREE AND CLASS FOUR OF {HELMSHORE COUNTY PRIMARY {SCHOOL,GREGORY FOLD,HELMSHORE.
